t: The*pn Lord*s reigns, let the earth rejoice; Let*ln the many islands be glad.
Clouds*ln and thick darkness surround Him; Righteousness*ln and justice are the foundation of His throne.
Fire*ln goes before Him And*ln burns up His adversaries round about.
His*ln lightnings lit up the world; The*ln earth saw and trembled.
The*ln mountains melted like wax at the presence of the Lord,*s At*ln the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
The*ln heavens declare His righteousness, And*ln all the peoples have seen His glory.
Let*ln all those be ashamed who serve graven images, Who*ln boast themselves of idols; Worship*ln Him, all you gods.
Zion*ln heard this*i and was glad, And*ln the daughters of Judah have rejoiced Because*ln of Your judgments, O Lord.*s
For*ln You are the Lord*s Most High over all the earth; You*ln are exalted far above all gods.
Hate*ln evil, you who love the Lord,*s Who*ln preserves the souls of His godly ones; He*ln delivers them from the hand of the wicked.
Light*ln is sown like*i seed*i for the righteous And*ln gladness for the upright in heart.
Be*ln glad in the Lord,*s you righteous ones, And*ln give thanks to His holy name.
